David J. Mansfield

Chief Executive Officer
PERMA-PIPE International Holdings, Inc.

A Message From Our CEO

Welcome to the PERMA-PIPE website. I truly appreciate your time to learn more about our company.

PERMA-PIPE’s corporate culture is defined by a simple set of core values that define how we operate every day – Safety, Valuing People, Integrity, Teamwork, Respect, and Accountability. They reflect how we interact with our customers, our employees, our partners, and our communities. With the utmost of integrity and respect, we hold each other accountable for creating a company we can all be proud to work for and one that customers can trust.

PERMA-PIPE’s success was built on our long history, manufacturing excellence, strong partnerships, superior customer service, technical expertise, and successful execution of projects globally. Furthermore, Perma-Pipe continues to innovate, improve operations, develop new solutions to complex market challenges, and maintain our world-class safety record.

This is made possible by our talented team of employees and partners, who enable us to operate competitively, effectively, and efficiently in offering our customers the very best. Without their capabilities, resilience, and loyalty, these results would not be possible.

Regardless of the reason you decided to visit our website, I hope you will take away an understanding and appreciation for our company’s people and the values we share. When you do business with PERMA-PIPE, you can rest assured that you will experience the very best from start to finish.

I am excited about our future and the future of our customers. Please be sure to contact our team if we can help you in any way.
